templars.note: In a large open area, cannot miss him.
At the end of a narrow alley, in a small open area. Next to a small building with a ladder and a wooden spear rack.
In the middle of a curved alley way.
On top of a roof, in between two smaller buildings on top, and underneath a load of wooden planks.
In a large open area, in front of a building close to a bench with rugs on the wall and beside a huge thin tree.
Around the side of the large indoor market. Clearly visible.
In the middle of a dead end alley beside the large Palace like building, standing infront of the rounded building.
